locations.name: Your Dorm Room (Morning)
locations.brief_description: You are in your dorm room at Chestnut Residence.
locations.long_description: You wake up in a panic in your dorm room at Chestnut Residence. Your desk is cluttered with notes, empty coffee cups, and your laptop—now dangerously low on battery. You need your USB drive, your laptop charger, and your lucky UofT mug! You should retrace your steps! You also know you can’t focus without a drink to keep you energized.

locations.name: Chestnut Lobby
locations.brief_description: You are in the lobby of Chestnut Residence.
locations.long_description: The front desk assistant is busy with some paperwork, and a few students are chatting near the vending machines. Maybe you left something here when you grabbed a snack last night. There is a vending machine and an exit that leads to Elm Street, where you can head towards campus.

locations.name: Robarts Library
locations.long_description: Robarts is eerily quiet this morning. A few students are still studying from the night before. The table where you were working is in the corner, covered in leftover study materials. Maybe your USB drive is here? You also remember stopping by the cafe on the second floor.

locations.name: Study Table
locations.brief_description: You are at your old study table in Robarts.
locations.long_description: Your old study table has an empty coffee cup, a few crumpled notes, and your USB drive sitting among them. You better grab it before someone else does! The only way back is to the main library floor.

locations.name: Robarts Café
locations.brief_description: You are in Robarts Café on the second floor.
locations.long_description: The aroma of coffee fills the air. You remember stopping here for a caffeine boost. A barista is wiping down the counter, and a student is struggling to carry multiple drinks. Maybe they saw your lucky mug?

locations.name: Barista Counter
locations.brief_description: You are at the counter in Robarts Café.
locations.long_description: The barista recognizes you! 'Hey, you left this behind last night.' Your lucky UofT mug is sitting behind the counter. You better take it with you!

locations.name: Your Dorm Room (Evening)
locations.brief_description: You are back in your dorm room, ready to make a decision.
locations.long_description: You have collected everything you need: your USB drive, your laptop charger, and your lucky UofT mug. You also have a drink to keep you focused. Now, it’s time to decide—will you finish your assignment or give up?

locations.long_description: Before you can buy a drink, the vending machine prompts you to solve a puzzle.

locations.long_description: Before enter, you must answer a puzzle correctly to authenticate yourself.
